qas.question: How much more power does a standard incandescent bulb use compared to LED?
What is the average lifetime of a CFL?
How much power does a halogen lamp save compared to a standard blub?

context: LED lamps have been advocated as the newest and best environmental lighting method. According to the Energy Saving Trust, LED lamps use only <a0_0>10%<a0_0/> power compared to a standard incandescent bulb, where compact fluorescent lamps use 20% and energy saving halogen lamps <a2_0>70%<a2_0/>. The lifetime is also much longer — up to <a1_0>50,000 hours<a1_0/>. A downside is still the initial cost, which is higher than that of compact fluorescent lamps.
